text: "2021"... YOU KNOW WHAT THIS MEANS RIGHT!? COVID-19 DID HAPPEN IN THE HAIKYUU TIMELINE AND THE OLYMPICS HAD TO BE SKIPPED. WE'RE LOOKING INTO THE FUTURE BABYYY HAHA THAT MEANS ALL THESE CHARACTERS HAD THEIR QUARANTINE YEAR I'M LAUGHING #HAIKYUU401 https://t.co/AMDE6hCEL7
